summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of E. Marginal Way S. between Carleton Ave. S. and 16th Ave. S.; authorizing the execution of agreements with the Washington State Urban Arterial Board for Financial assistance therefor; making an appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund; authorizing the hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts; and increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1979 Budget of the Engineering Department.
